TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
"Not" granted.

I wish I had some cool theme music about my life.

Granted.

I wish that all the cute ladies fancy me. (I wanna see some sick corrupting of this one:P)

Granted. All the cute ladies fancy your eyes, so they rip them out of your eye sockets.

I wish i could get an Xbox One for Christmas.

Granted. It's one of the early test models with DRM, and it isn't compatible with XBOX TV.

I wish simcity 6, which would be WITHOUT DRM and had really big plots of land, would come out tomorrow.

Granted. It doesn't start up.

I wish for a pet Mudkip.

Granted but then it evolves into a Swampert and beats you to a pulp.

I wish for three more wishes

EDIT: My wish has been granted!

I wish for three more wishes

I wish for three more wishes

I wish for three more wishes

I wish for three more wishes

I wish for three more wishes

I wish for three more wishes

I wish for three more wishes

I wish for three more wishes...

Edited December 10, 2013 by dudester28

Granted. But you can only use those wishes to wish for more wishes, and those wishes to wish for more wishes, ad infinitum. (Latin: to infinity)

I wish for a buran shuttle.

Granted. Jeb is flying it.

I wish for a new Pax Romana.

Granted, but everyone decides to kill you (quietly) to get rid of it.

I wish for a place to live.

Granted. But it is on mercury.

I wish I had power! (Yet another Code Geass reference)

Granted. You now have a dying battery.

I wish.

Granted, but since you stated a statement instead of a wish, you get forever banned from wishing on this forum again.

I wish for a paper bag

Granted, Your paper bag has dog poop in it

I wish for a cookie

Granted, but it's toxic.

I wish for a firebrand.

Granted. The fire is inside your throat, and the brand is the most terrible thing ever. (You got Hello Kitty mittens mate)

I wish Doctor Who was real.

Granted. A weeping angel is behind you.

I wish for a fast computer with three titan gpus in it.

Granted, but you are a Cyberman.

I wish I had a (working) sonic screwdriver.

Granted. You forgot the cooler, so it burned down. You also got a the bill for the GPU's and I'm telling you, it ain't cheap.

I wish for a poptart

EDIT: Ninja'd by Danish! Ok, in that case: Granted. You burn it in the toaster, which then proceeds to set your house on fire and burn it down.

I wish to be a Knightmare/Frame Pilot.

Granted. You forgot the cooler, so it burned down. You also got a the bill for the GPU's and I'm telling you, it ain't cheap.

I wish for a poptart

Granted, but it startes to crap rainbows and became a meme.

I want the ability to fly.

EDIT: Ninja'd by Danish! Ok, in that case: Granted. You burn it in the toaster, which then proceeds to set your house on fire and burn it down.

I wish to be a Knightmare/Frame Pilot.

Granted, but it startes to crap rainbows and became a meme.

I want the ability to fly.

These to can be combined to the same so...

You can fly around in your Mech, however it meets a Dalek and gets EXTERMINATED.

I wish for a weapon that can kill time.

Granted, however when Time dies, you go with it and stay frozen forever.

I wish for a Delorean.

Granted. Upon arrival of it, it changes into scrap

I wish for Blender to render the compositions

Granted. But the granter (me) had no idea what you meant, so I he has no idea what he granted you.

I wish for aliens.

Granted. The aliens turn out to be hostile and they rip open the top of your head and drink your brain with a bendy straw.

I wish I could make a good comeback.
